attributes.action: instigate or recommend (to the relevant body) random drug testing for darts players
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Darts is a sport that generates quite a lot of money.

Being a sport, its players should be subject to the same rules as other sports, which includes random drug tests.  This would help to maintain darts as a clean, fair sport, and would push penalties on those players found to be taking performance-enhancing drugs (steroids etc).
